(If you have, explain; including the name(s) and Social Security number(s) used.) 26.1 have have not been treated for a mental disorder, drug addiction or alcoholism. 27.1 have have not been arrested, convicted or confined in a prison. 28.1 have have not been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency or similar action.
